hero.title: Ikpo Okwu Azụmahịa Ụwa
hero.subtitle: N'efu ruo mgbe ebighị ebi maka njirimara ndị bụ isi
hero.description: Dott na-enyere ndị nwe azụmahịa dịka gị aka ịmepụta akwụkwọ nnata ego, ịnata ụgwọ n'ịntanetị, ijikwa ego na ngwaahịa, yana inyocha koodu—ihe niile n'otu ikpo okwu dị mfe.
hero.trustedBy: Azụmahịa karịrị 10,000 n'ụwa niile tụkwasịrị anyị obi

benefit.free: Atụmatụ n'efu ruo mgbe ebighị ebi

pricing.heading: Họrọ Atụmatụ Kwesịrị Azụmahịa Gị
pricing.subheading: Enweghị ego zoro ezo. Achọghị kaadị kredit maka atụmatụ Basic. Kagbuo mgbe ọ bụla.

professional.name: Professional
professional.description: Maka azụmahịa na-eto eto chọrọ karịa

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: Oke na-enweghị njedebe maka nnukwu nzukọ

features.heading: Ihe Niile Ị Chọrọ Ito N'ụwa Niile
features.subheading: Ngwaọrụ dị ike emebere azụmahịa ọgbara ọhụrụ na-arụ ọrụ gafee oke

operations.title: Njikwa Ọrụ
operations.description: Mee ka ọrụ azụmahịa gị kwa ụbọchị dị mfe

financial.title: Njikwa Ego
financial.description: Njikwa zuru ezu nke ego azụmahịa gị

global.title: Ngwaọrụ Azụmahịa Ụwa
global.description: Ihe niile ị chọrọ iji rụọ ọrụ n'ụwa niile

trust.title: Ewuru maka Nchekwa na Nrube isi

footer.tagline: Ime ka nchịkwa azụmahịa dị mfe ma dị irè maka ụlọ ọrụ n'ụwa niile.

faq.heading: Ajụjụ Ndị A Na-ajụkarị
faq.subheading: Chọta azịza nye ajụjụ ndị a na-ajụkarị gbasara ikpo okwu anyị na ọrụ anyị.

feature.inventory.description: Nleba anya ngwaahịa n'oge ozugbo na nyocha barcode na nkwado ọtụtụ ebe
feature.barcode.description: Mepụta ma nyochaa barcode maka ngwaahịa na akwụkwọ
feature.pos.description: Sistemụ POS ọgbara ọhụrụ nwere ike ọrụ na-enweghị ịntanetị
feature.invoicing: Akwụkwọ ụgwọ Ego Dị Iche Iche
feature.invoicing.description: Akwụkwọ ụgwọ ọkachamara na ego karịrị 50 na mgbanwe akpaka
feature.tax.description: Mgbakọ ụtụ akpaka maka mba karịrị 100
feature.reporting.description: Nghọta n'oge ozugbo na ndụmọdụ AI
feature.payments.description: Nabata ịkwụ ụgwọ site na ụzọ mpaghara na mba ọ bụla
feature.global.description: Jikwaa akwụkwọ azụmahịa mba ụwa na nrube isi
feature.security.description: Nchekwa ọkwa ụlọ akụ na nrube isi mpaghara
feature.jobs.description: Nleba anya ọrụ site na mmalite ruo na njedebe na ọnụ ahịa n'oge ozugbo, ngwa mkpanaka, na nyocha uru

highlights.multiplePayments: Ụzọ ịkwụ ụgwọ dị iche iche
highlights.mobileFieldApp: Ngwa mkpanaka maka ndị ọrụ n'ọhịa
